fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Public Health, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: The new copyright protection / directive for Text and Data Mining
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Innoplexus AG offers Data-as-a-Service and Continuous Analytics-as-a-Service products and solutions that help organizations move towards continuous decision-making. By leveraging cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning and Blockchain technologies, Innoplexus helps organizations generate insights from structured and unstructured private and public data. Founded in 2011, INNOPLEXUS AG is headquartered in Eschborn, Germany with offices in Pune, India, and Hoboken, USA.
